${modID}:Azgc.NAME: [/azgc]
${modID}:Azgc.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Deal !D! damage. If the enemy is intended to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:BrainDeadStrike.NAME: Brain-dead Strike
${modID}:BrainDeadStrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. Deal X + !M! times of !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Always -> Discard ALL cards in hand.

${modID}:BrilliantAppearance.NAME: Brilliant Appearance!
${modID}:BrilliantAppearance.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Exhausted. ${modID}:Magic. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain !M! ${modID}:Magics. NL Failed -> Gain double ${modID}:Magics.

${modID}:CreditStrike.NAME: Credit Strike
${modID}:CreditStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy's rate of health is lower, deal another !D! damage and gain 1 ${modID}:Happy; otherwise, gain 1 ${modID}:Sad.

${modID}:DeerCrash.NAME: Deer Crash
${modID}:DeerCrash.DESCRIPTION: Discard ALL non-Attack in hand, each deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:DifficultToBeng.NAME: Difficult to Beng
${modID}:DifficultToBeng.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Reduce 1 ${modID}:Magics when ${modID}:check failed this turn.

${modID}:FoodShare.NAME: Food Share
${modID}:FoodShare.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. Deal half of ${modID}:Magics amount of damage !M! times. NL Failed -> Lose half of the ${modID}:Magics.

${modID}:GoodMorning.NAME: Good Morning
${modID}:GoodMorning.DESCRIPTION: Innate. For each Attack in hand, deal !D! damage and gain 1 [E].

${modID}:ImHittingHard.NAME: I'm Hitting Hard
${modID}:ImHittingHard.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable. Add Are You Hitting? to hand.
${modID}:ImHittingHard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable. Add upgraded Are You Hitting? to hand.

${modID}:LongSand.NAME: Long Sand
${modID}:LongSand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Can be upgraded many times.

${modID}:LittleDrink.NAME: Little Drink
${modID}:LittleDrink.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! ${modID}:Magics and temporary Strength.

${modID}:LightCast.NAME: Light Cast
${modID}:LightCast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL. Kill ALL enemies whose health is lower than 16 at end of turn. NL If ${modID}:Magics less than !M!, randomly deal !D! damage.

${modID}:MagicAndMagic.NAME: Magic and Magic
${modID}:MagicAndMagic.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. Deal !D! damage. Success -> Take another ${modID}:check to deal double damage.

${modID}:Nia.NAME: nia
${modID}:Nia.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return to hand from discard after playing an Attack which cost is not 0.

${modID}:RushRush.NAME: Rush Rush
${modID}:RushRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Add 2 Rush to hand.

${modID}:SinisterSmile.NAME: Sinister Smile
${modID}:SinisterSmile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy is not intended to attack, deal another !D! damage and gain such temporay health.

${modID}:SingleSix.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 6 times. NL When in hand, reduce !M! cost this turn whenever playing cardsï¼Œ reset when this card drawn again.

${modID}:SteamStart.NAME: Steam Start
${modID}:SteamStart.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. Exhausted. ${modID}:Magic. Deal !D! damage. Failed -> Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 7 turns later.

${modID}:ThisBombBro.NAME: This Bomb, bro!
${modID}:ThisBombBro.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. Add a copy to hand next X turns.

${modID}:TrueAlgorismGod.NAME: True Algorism God
${modID}:TrueAlgorismGod.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Double the base damage and modulo !M! after played.

${modID}:Wrud.NAME: wrud
${modID}:Wrud.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. NL Increase damage and Block by !M! when drawn.

${modID}:Alarmism.NAME: Alarmism
${modID}:Alarmism.DESCRIPTION: Defend ALL attack damage in 1 turn, give back equal amount of Block.
${modID}:Alarmism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Defend ALL attack damage in 1 turn, give back half amount of Block.

${modID}:AreYouHitting.NAME: Are You Hitting?
${modID}:AreYouHitting.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. If the enemy is intended to attack, Stun it and add I'm Hitting Hard to hand.
${modID}:AreYouHitting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. If the enemy is intended to attack, Stun it and add upgraded I'm Hitting Hard to hand.

${modID}:Bb.NAME: [/bb]
${modID}:Bb.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Ethereal. Apply !M! Weak. NL Deal 11 damage to ALL when this card is discarded.

${modID}:Bx.NAME: [/bx]
${modID}:Bx.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Gain !M! temporary health. Draw 1 card.

${modID}:BangBangT.NAME: [/bangbangt]
${modID}:BangBangT.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Unplayable. While in hand, randomly discard 1 card and gain !M! Strength whenever play another card.

${modID}:FakeNineChampion.NAME: Fake Nine Champion
${modID}:FakeNineChampion.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Add 9 random card to bottom of draw pile.
${modID}:FakeNineChampion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Add 9 random upgraded card to bottom of draw pile.

${modID}:GrassHead.NAME: Grass Head
${modID}:GrassHead.DESCRIPTION: Make ALL enemies take !M! ${modID}:saving checks, each failure leads to 6 health loss.

${modID}:IAmMagicMan.NAME: I Am Magic Man!
${modID}:IAmMagicMan.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Increase ${modID}:Magics by 5. Next ${modID}:check result is always success.
${modID}:IAmMagicMan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Increase ${modID}:Magics by 5. Next ${modID}:check result is always ${modID}:Critical Success.

${modID}:HelpHelpMe.NAME: Help Help Me
${modID}:HelpHelpMe.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Let an enemy take a saving check. If saving failed, heal you !M! health.

${modID}:LittleManLanguage.NAME: Little Man Language
${modID}:LittleManLanguage.DESCRIPTION: ALL cards change cost to 1 this turn.
${modID}:LittleManLanguage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL cards that cost more than 1 change cost to 1 this turn.

${modID}:LookStillAttractive.NAME: Look Still Attractive
${modID}:LookStillAttractive.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Gain !M! ${modID}:Happy. If the enemy is intended to attack, gain !M! Strength; otherwise, gain !M! Dexterity..

${modID}:MagicBigMove.NAME: Magic Big Move
${modID}:MagicBigMove.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. ${modID}:Magic. Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak to ALL enemies. NL Failed -> Add !M! [/Bb] to hand.

${modID}:MagicFriend.NAME: Magic Friend
${modID}:MagicFriend.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Randomly gain !B! Block or add [/BangBangT] to draw pile. Add 2 copies to dicard pile.
${modID}:MagicFriend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Randomly gain !B! Block or add upgraded [/BangBangT] to draw pile. Add 2 copies to dicard pile.

${modID}:Man.NAME: man
${modID}:Man.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add a copy to draw pile after played.

${modID}:MilkDragonCry.NAME: Milk-dragon Cry
${modID}:MilkDragonCry.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. Gain !B! Block. NL Failed -> Still gain half of the Block. NL Return to hand from discard pile when taken damage.

${modID}:MagicSpread.NAME: Magic Spread
${modID}:MagicSpread.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Make an enemy take a ${modID}:saving check each start of turn and lose 1 Strength if saving failed.
${modID}:MagicSpread.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Make an enemy take a ${modID}:saving check each end of turn and lose 1 Strength if saving failed.

${modID}:Niu.NAME: niu
${modID}:Niu.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Double one of the buffs or debuffs randomly.
${modID}:Niu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Double one of the buffs randomly.

${modID}:NotToSay.NAME: Nothing to Say
${modID}:NotToSay.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. End your turn.

${modID}:Rush.NAME: Rush
${modID}:Rush.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Exhausted. Draw !M! card. Next ${modID}:check decrease by 1.

${modID}:Roller.NAME: Roller
${modID}:Roller.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Add 1 Void to discard and 1 Dazed to draw pile.

${modID}:SoHandsomeBro.NAME: So Handsome, bro!
${modID}:SoHandsomeBro.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Gain !B! Block. NL Can be played only when ${modID}:Magics no less than 16.
${modID}:SoHandsomeBro.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Retain. Gain !B! Block. NL Can be played only when ${modID}:Magics no less than 16.

${modID}:WhatCanISay.NAME: what can i say
${modID}:WhatCanISay.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted. Discard ALL cards in hand and draw cards until full. NL Can be played only when have no [E].
${modID}:WhatCanISay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard ALL cards in hand and draw cards until full. NL Can be played only when have no [E].

${modID}:WordForWord.NAME: Word For Word
${modID}:WordForWord.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL cards in hand. Add equal amount of random cards to hand.

${modID}:YouAreAttackGod.NAME: You Are Attack God!
${modID}:YouAreAttackGod.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Magic. If an enemy is intended to attack, prevent the next !M! times you would lose health. NL Failed -> Gain 1 Vulnerable.

${modID}:Yx.NAME: [/yx]
${modID}:Yx.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Make an enemy lose !M! health. Draw 1 card.

${modID}:Combination.NAME: Combination
${modID}:Combination.DESCRIPTION: Gain Confution. At start of turn, draw 1 more card.

${modID}:EverythingIsEmoji.NAME: Everything Is Emoji
${modID}:EverythingIsEmoji.DESCRIPTION: At start of turn, draw 1 more card; then Exhaust 1 card and add a random ${modID}:Emoji to hand.

${modID}:GaintMagicMaster.NAME: Gaint Magic Master
${modID}:GaintMagicMaster.DESCRIPTION: ALL ${modID}:check decrease by 5, but deal !M! damage to random when playing ${modID}:Magic cards.

${modID}:HitCardMan.NAME: Hit Card Man
${modID}:HitCardMan.DESCRIPTION: At start of turn, randomly gain !M! Strength or Dexterity or ${modID}:Magics.

${modID}:MagicDetection.NAME: Magic Detection
${modID}:MagicDetection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage when an enemy is taking ${modID}:saving check.

${modID}:MagicForm.NAME: Magic Form
${modID}:MagicForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Magics and ${modID}:Happy at start of turn. Obtain ${modID}:Advantage for your ALL ${modID}:check.

${modID}:WoodieMaster.NAME: Woodie Master
${modID}:WoodieMaster.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL Free to play Starter Strike and Defend, draw 1 card after playing them.
